name: node-sws
readme:
sws === SecureWebSocket implementation over NACL ### API/Usage * In Node.js, refer to tests/node.js * In Browser, refer to demos/srv.js, demos/content/ * Used as stream, refer to tests/stream.js, support Node.js only ### Spec/RFC * https://github.com/InstantWebP2P/sws-spec ### Install * npm install node-sws
